class AbstractGrid

Detailed Description

Contains information about smooth scrolling and can be retrieved by derived classes by invoking AbstractGrid::GetSmoothScrollInfo. Usually it is not necessary to care about this information, but might be useful if additional components must be coordinated with the smooth scrolling.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

AbstractGrid::SmoothScrollInfo::~SmoothScrollInfo (   ) 
 

Member Function Documentation

XYDIM AbstractGrid::SmoothScrollInfo::GetDiff (   )  const [inline]
 

Returns the current difference in pixels of the original placement in comparison to the smooth scrolled placement. The value is always smaller than the height/width of a cell.

XYDIM AbstractGrid::SmoothScrollInfo::GetInc (   )  const [inline]
 

Returns the increment which is added when the scroll timer expires.

const Timer& AbstractGrid::SmoothScrollInfo::GetTimer (   )  const [inline]
 

Returns the timer which triggers the smooth scrolling.

BOOLEAN AbstractGrid::SmoothScrollInfo::IsHorizontal (   )  const [inline]
 

Returns TRUE, if the smooth scrolling is done horizontally, FALSE if it's done vertically.

BOOLEAN AbstractGrid::SmoothScrollInfo::IsMirrored (   )  const [inline]
 

Returns TRUE, if the selector has a mirrored clone. This might happen e. g. on an 3 x 3 grid if the selection is moved left on item 0. In this case the selection is visible on item 0 and mirrored on item 8.

BOOLEAN AbstractGrid::SmoothScrollInfo::IsSelector (   )  const [inline]
 

Returns TRUE, if the selector is scrolled smoothly. Otherwise the whole content will be scrolled.
